description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=1/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=3/3. The drinking game of friendship and rivalry, Flip Cup is now on Xbox. One-handed gameplay design lets you easily Chug and Flip while holding a drink! Party with up to 40 players and enjoy frantic splitscreen for 4 teams! Come see how we craft the best in drunk fun - with Drinkards and Drinkards Beer Pong under our belts this is our best yet. You won't be disappointed - or sober! Flip responsibly.
